page.title: 13LEISURE IN SOUTH CHEADLE.
page.content: THERE ARE ALOT OF CLUBS IN THIS AREA.MOST OF THEM HAVE TO DO WITH SPORT, SUCH AS THE MANCHESTER ATHLETIC CLUB WHICH MEETS AT SCHOLES PARK,A GYM CLUB WHICH MEETS AT THE KINGSWAY SCHOOL,A GOLF CLUB AND A SQUASH CLUB AT GATLEY GOLF CLUB,BESIDE BARCHESTER TENNIS CLUB AND BROOKSIDE TENNIS CLUB. THERE ARE MANY SOCIAL AND LEISURE CLUBS FOR YOUNG CHILDREN LIKE CUBS,BROWNIES,SCOUTS,AND GUIDES WHICH MEET ONCE A WEEK AT BROWN LANE METHODIST CHURCH. THERE ARE ALSO SOME CLUBS FOR ADULTS,A BABYSITTING GROUP,A BIBLE STUDY GROUP AND SOME KEEP FIT GROUPS ALL MEETING AT BROWN LANE METHODIST CHURCH.MOST OF THESE CLUBS ARE EASY TO REACH AND ALTHOUGH SOME DO MAKE A CHARGE YOU DO NOT HAVE TO PAY MUCH. ALL IN ALL MOST PEOPLE THINK THE CLUBS IN THIS AREA ARE PRETTY GOOD.
